revised_title: Study of Tsunami Waves and Earthquakes: Comparing Krakatoa and Bay of Bengal
tldr: This article discusses the study of tsunami waves and earthquakes, comparing the wave from the Krakatoa eruption to the one in the Bay of Bengal. The author analyzes the wave velocities and their relationship with ocean depth and water configuration. The study highlights the differences in wave velocities and magnitudes between the two events, providing valuable insights into the behavior of these natural phenomena.
